import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', message: '' }); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Add form submission logic here console.log('Form submitted:', formData); }; const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; return (
